title.narrative: Support for UNICEF Supply Division COVID-19

description.narrative:
The contribution to UNICEF will be targeted two mutual-reinforcing aspects of the COVID-19 response and vaccine efforts:
1) UNICEF’s ACT-A Supply Financing Fund will be supported with DKK 30 million in order to; support the procurement of 50-100 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines, the procurement of 500 million syringes, 10,000 refrigerators, and freight and in-country delivery costs for receiving countries
2) Increased warehouse capacity in UNICEF Supply Division’s warehouse in Copenhagen in order to meet rising demands for effective storage and distribution of supplies in support of COVID-19 response and vaccination efforts. The additional storage space will allow for storage of pallets to store PPE, syringes and disposal boxes, oxygen concentrators and other key supplies.
